{{Description|Now can you miss out on Wushou dancing during Lantern Rite? Put on your outfit and play "Just Wushou Dance!" with friends, competing to grab various Teabricks, and experiencing the boisterous atmosphere.}}
'''Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices''' is part of the [[Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze]] event in [[Version 4.4]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices 1.png
|text1  = In "Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices," you must complete stage objectives within the time limit and score the highest amount of points possible.<br>Press to use your Skill and don a special Wushou Dance puppet costume to enter {{Color|help|Bumper Wushou mode}} and {{Color|help|knock aside}} other participants that you come into contact with.<br>When two parties in Bumper Wushou mode come into contact with each other, both parties will have their Bumper Wushou mode deactivated.
|image2 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices 2.png
|text2  = "Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices" has a total of 3 stages for players to choose from. Different stage and game mode rules can be viewed under Gameplay Details.
|image3 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices 3.png
|text3  = "Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices" has 2 gameplay modes: You can invite multiple teammates to play together or match with other players.<br>4 participants are required to start "Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices."
}}

;Good Things Come Rolling In
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices Good Things Come Rolling In 1.png
|text1  = IIn the "Good Things Come Rolling In" stage, you need to collect as many {{Color|help|Lucky Teabricks}} as possible within the time limit to score points.<br>Lucky Teabricks come in small and large forms, and the latter are worth more points.
|image2 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices Good Things Come Rolling In 2.png
|text2  = Use your Bumper Wushou to knock other participants away. You can also obtain any Lucky Teabricks dropped by other participants.
}}

;Race to the Top
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices Race to the Top 1.png
|text1  = In the "Race to the Top" stage, the more {{Color|help|Valor}} you possess, the higher your score when the challenge ends.<br>You can use the following methods to gain {{Color|help|Valor}}: Gaining and holding onto {{Color|help|Fortune Teabricks}}, staying on the {{Color|help|platform(s)}}, and using your Bumper Wushou to knock away other participants.
|image2 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices Race to the Top 2.png
|text2  = A Fortune Teabrick will appear on the field at intervals, and the first player to pick one up will hold it for a time, during which they will gain Valor continuously.<br>If the holder is sent flying by another participant using Bumper Wushou, they will lose said Fortune Teabrick, and the one who sent them flying will gain a fixed reward.
|image3 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices Race to the Top 3.png
|text3 = Parts of the field will rise at intervals to turn into elevated platforms. Stay on these platforms to continuously gain Valor.<br>At the same time, you will continuously lose Valor if you remain in the hazardous areas that appear.
}}

;To Pluck Good Fortune
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices To Pluck Good Fortune 1.png
|text1  = In the "To Pluck Good Fortune" stage, participants start with {{Color|help|Mildness}}. When the challenge starts, participants will be affected by Super Spicy Spirit and continuously lose {{Color|help|Mildness}}.<br>When the challenge ends, the more {{Color|help|Mildness}} you still have, the higher your score will be.
|image2 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices To Pluck Good Fortune 2.png
|text2  = {{Color|help|Safe zones}} will also appear on the field at intervals. {{Color|help|Enter them}} to avoid the effects of Super Spicy Spirit.
|image3 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices To Pluck Good Fortune 3.png
|text3 = {{Color|help|Prosperous Teabricks}} will appear on the field at intervals. {{Color|help|Collect them}} to gain a certain amount of Mildness.
|image4 = Tutorial Vibrant Harriers Aloft in Spring Breeze Joyful Beasts and Their Auspices To Pluck Good Fortune 4.png
|text4  = {{Color|help|Super Spicy Wok Hey}} will explode across the challenge area at intervals. You will receive a warning before {{Color|help|Super Spicy Wok Hey}} appears.<br>If you are unable to get into a safe zone and avoid the Super Spicy Wok Hey shockwave before it hits, you will {{Color|help|lose a lot of Mildness}}.<br>Successfully avoiding it will, on the other hand, {{Color|help|restore a large amount of Mildness}}.
}}
